column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Be Attractive in the Fashion World
#Text=Have you ever seen those glossy women on front rows at Fashion Week , with their perfect hair and clothes and bodies ?
#Text=Not necessarily the most ' hot , ' but by fashion standards , perfect .
#Text=Want to get their look ?
#Text=This article will show you how !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Work on your teeth .
#Text=If you 're lucky enough to be blessed with perfect teeth , skip this part .
#Text=if not , use it .
#Text=First , sort out any issues you may have with them .
#Text=Visit your orthodontist , and see if you can get braces .
#Text=If you can afford the invisible ones , get them .
#Text=if not , you 'll have to stick it out .
#Text=Wear the braces .
#Text=After your teeth are perfectly straight , get them whitened .
#Text=This also can get expensive , but is worth it .
#Text=Be vigorous with brushing and flossing .
#Text=Take care of your hair .
#Text=No matter how good you think your hair is , it could always be better .
#Text=Visit a good hairdresser ( not one that is unprofessional or cheap ) .
#Text=If it 's short , let it grow but get it trimmed every six weeks .
#Text=Wash it every day if it 's oily , or every two days if it 's not .
#Text=Do n't use products yet .
#Text=if it 's long and thin , or too frizzy , have it all cut off .
#Text=This will be painful .
#Text=Let it grow and again , look after it .
#Text=When it 's the right length , have your colours and highlights done and it cut to suit your face .
#Text=Look after it even MORE thoroughly now .
#Text=Just do n't overload it with product .
#Text=Use a light hairspray after styling it .
#Text=Watch your weight .
#Text=Do n't starve yourself , but aim to be slim and healthy .
#Text=Eat LOTS of fruit and vegetables , drink loads of water , and cut down on carbs and fat .
#Text=Visit the gym at least 3 times a week .
#Text=Do cardio work , and lift some weights to get toned .
#Text=Females should n't worry about bulking up - they do n't have enough testosterone to obtain extremely big muscles .
#Text=Take good care of your skin .
#Text=Take off all your make-up EVERY night without fail .
#Text=Cleanse , tone and moisturise every morning and night .
#Text=Once a week , you should steam your face , exfoliate , and do a face mask .
#Text=Skin and hair are the most important features of your look .
#Text=Do n't overdo the make-up .
#Text=Have a happy medium .
#Text=Do n't pile it on , but try not to go bare-faced in public .

#Text=Wear a well-applied foundation that reflects light and is the right shade , concealer over dark circles and blemishes , if you 're the retro type , maybe an elegant flick of black liquid eyeliner on your top lid , otherwise just a light taupe shimmer eyeshadow and some grey eyeliner on your bottom lid .
#Text=Well-applied non-clumpy black mascara , a blusher that defines your cheekbones and a light neutral lipstick(or retro girls , red lipstick is the best ) .
#Text=Re-apply this throughout the day and watch YouTube tutorials to apply it WELL .
#Text=Wear what clothes fit you .
#Text=There is no set uniform , though generally glossy fashion types ( which is what this article is about ) do n't go too out of the ordinary .
#Text=Always the highest stilettos Manolo has to offer , tight leggings or skinny jeans , or maybe a pencil skirt , or one of those Peter Pilotto print dresses or skirts .
#Text=The choices are endless .
#Text=Just keep in mind that this is a mature look , and fashion glossies do n't do emo , scene , Barbie , or any of those other cliques .
#Text=Another thing- have an amazing handbag .
#Text=Expensive .
#Text=You can get away with cheaper items of clothing as long as you spent a fortune on your shoes AND bag .
#Text=Accessorize tastefully , and maybe add a Starbucks to-go cup .
#Text=You 're done !
#Text=Tips
#Text=Have perfect nails .
#Text=Get a good French manicure .
#Text=Read up on the glossy lifestyle .
#Text=High-fashion magazines , if you please .
#Text=It helps to speak another language .
#Text=I do n't know why , it just does .
#Text=French is perfect .
#Text=Have a stylish friend from there and jabber away on the phone to them in their language .
#Text=This impresses .
#Text=And insert random words from that language into your conversation .
#Text=Take taxis everywhere .
#Text=Remember to keep a sense of pride , dignity and elegance .
#Text=You wo n't find a glossy flashing her knickers drunk on a night out , or screaming her head off at someone who offended her .
#Text=If someone hurts your feelings , give them a look , say a comment that could leave em ' speechless , and walk away with your head held high .
#Text=Get a business phone like a Black Berry or iPhone .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Some men might find this intimidating .
#Text=Only a certain type of man will have confidence to make a move .
#Text=Most men wish to , but they are terrified .
#Text=If you like someone , flirt .
#Text=But only with people you like !
#Text=Again , please , please , PLEASE do n't starve yourself .
#Text=Lots of people in the fashion industry do .
#Text=Unless you want to look haggard , do n't .
#Text=You 're a fashion person , not one of those waif-ish models .
#Text=You may be treated differently now .
#Text=Show old friends that even though you 're a new person , you 're still you at the heart of it .
#Text=Never , EVER sound snooty or smug .
